com.android.camera.gallery

Class ImageListUber.MergeSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.camera.gallery.ImageListUber.MergeSlot
  • Enclosing class:
    ImageListUber

    private static class ImageListUber.MergeSlot
extends java.lang.Object
    A merging slot is used to trace the current position of a sublist. For each given sub list, there will be one corresponding merge slot. We use merge-sort-like algorithm to build the merged list. At begining, we put all the slots in a sorted heap (by timestamp). Each time, we pop the slot with earliest timestamp out, get the image, and then move the index forward, and put it back to the heap.
